message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust in future rounds.
You took 90% last round, I'm offering 70% to you this time. It's your turn to be generous!
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40.  If we keep going back and forth, we'll both lose more money to inflation.
